title: Nice plot but with lot of things unrealistic
review: Although the idea was quite great but still have a feeling that it could have been executed in a better way ... Action was completely unrealistic ..hero single handedly tackling lot of enemies and He is freely using guns in London and London police is sleeping ....lolz

title: Overkill of fighting and chasing scenes without giving any attention to the storyline
review: Every five minutes, Gautam(Mahesh Babu) has to fight someone. Every ten minutes, either he is chasing or being chased by someone. Just cut these scenes and this close to 3 hours film will reduce to 1 and a half. And then, there are songs to.A film without a love story can not exist in India. So here we have Kriti Sanon, playing Sameera, a part time news reporter and part time lover, in her debut venture. She has no role but to remain with Gautam throughout the film taking all the risks even if she don't know much about him. Just count how many films this cliche had destroyed. This is getting out of hand now.The final 10-12 minutes of the film were worth everything. The scene was beautifully shot, Mahesh Babu's acting was cherry on top. It's like the rest of the film is directed by someone else.

title: One of the greatest Thriller movies ever made
review: I am proud to say that for the very first time the Indian film has come out of the box from the past few decades.Excellent Direction and absolutely great execution and screenplay.. Love you Sukumar

title: A totally unexpected story ever made!
review: Bringing a medical condition and converging it with a revenge story in this way is totally a unique concept i have ever seen. Such movies are worth awards... The screenplay does not let your attention go off even for a second ! Fantabulous and must watch movie... Highly recommended!

title: Masterpeice movie
review: Different kind of script and master piece acting by super star. The only flaw I found is the more action sequences. The climax is one of the best ever directed in Telugu film industry. Music is ultimate especially background score.

title: Definitely overrated but decent
review: Decent movie with facepalm action scenes and really long. I watched Rangasthalam movie(directed by sukumar) which is almost perfect, well structured film. Rangasthalam made me watch this movie. Nenokkadine does has good plot and twists but there is a ton of boring and unwanted scenes. The movie has a runtime of almost 3 hrs but It might be really enjoyable if it's a 120 mins movie. 3 hour movie can be divided into first 120 mins which is confusing, slow and boring movie and the next 60 mins into a good movie. Chases and fight sequences are full of cringe worthy. I had a huge expectation for this movie. Sub par with my expectations, still a decent movie. Watch the movie!!!

title: A Revolution in Indian Cinema!

title: Outstanding masterpiece film!!!
review: Bestest and favorite movie of Mahesh...Acting , bgm, action was brilliant....Overall an epic masterpiece of TFI

title: Better than most Telugu action films but that isn't telling much
review: Better than the usual Telugu masala action flicks. The style is somewhat trying to be like Hollywood thrillers but hasn't quite let go of the Telugu masala film aesthetics. The technical side s impressive but falls down when they settle for usual commercial tropes and making any of it useless. The plot is unnecessarily convoluted but for a commercial Telugu action film, this is quite an experiment and commendable that it got an actual plot unlike many of those films. As much as I love the eye-candy of the film Kriti Sanon, her scenes were just dragging the rest of the film which is already overlong.

title: Commercial elements spoiled the film
review: The entire movies revolves around the psychological problems of the lead actor. It is an unconventional film among out of the mill scripts of Telugu cinema. The cinematography and music are top-notch.The story is gripping, but screenplay has been deliberately spoiled to add commercial elements. The love track has little significance in the overall story. You can sleep during the entire Goa episode, and can still understand the main plot. The stunts and item song are not relevant at some places.The director Sukumar should have taken care of the screenplay, but he focused mainly on easter eggs which add no value to the overall plot. It's a potential movie, but spoiled just to match the commercial image of Mahesh. It'd probably have been a blockbuster if made faithful to the original theme.

title: Do NOT fall for IMDb rating!! Not worth watching!
review: I was browsing randomly on IMDb to see if I can find a movie to watch. Recently I watched 'Vikram Vedha' and got impressed beyond my expectation. I used to think they make only masala movies. So, I came here looking for similar movies. Then I came across this movie. I was so excited seeing the IMDb rating. Though I knew the lead actor is known for doing masala movies, I thought maybe he did one good movie in his career. But, oh boy, I was so wrong! This is the same old s***, just in a different packet. Story has many flaws, acting is awful (especially the side characters) . The protagonist is as usual a Godlike person who can fight 20 men alone without getting a scratch. I still cannot fathom how he was shot at by ~20 people simultaneously in an open space but not a single bullet hit him. I expected to watch a serious movie, not this funny-yet-distasteful movie. To put things into perspective, The Usual Suspects (1995) is rated 8.6 on IMDb. If you think you are going to see a movie on a similar level to this masterpiece, I am sorry to say you will regret later. I just gave it a 4* just because it has a story (though with many flaws) unlike most South Indian movie and special effects were on satisfactory level.
